thread.title: Sean Payton says no “associate” of his reached out to the Colts
thread.title_full: Sean Payton says no “associate” of his reached out to the Colts

author: Mike Florio
title: Sean Payton says no “associate” of his reached out to the Colts
text:
6 Responses to “Sean Payton says no “associate” of his reached out to the Colts” tonebones says: Feb 3, 2017 5:35 PM 
Chuck Pagano has a much better record than Payton over the last five years. Why would the Colts look to Payton? Unless they’re thinking their roster was much stronger, but then why would they fire their GM? The whole story makes no sense. It’s just agents trying to manipulate. aj66shanghai says: Feb 3, 2017 5:37 PM 
The only team with a legitimate modern claim to being “America’s Team,” as they were in the aftermath of Katrina. How quickly times change. Feb 3, 2017 5:39 PM 
Sean Payton reminds me of every little league baseball coach i’ve ever had biggestsaintsfanever64 says: Feb 3, 2017 5:48 PM 
Hmmm, who to believe……The coach who has no reason to lie, or the media, who profit either way. straighcashhomey says: Feb 3, 2017 5:54 PM 
Who would wanna go to the colts? That franchise is a clown show. Karma Feb 3, 2017 5:57 PM 
tonebones says: Feb 3, 2017 5:35 PM Chuck Pagano has a much better record than Payton over the last five years.
